cast.overview: Record-shattering Korean girl band BLACKPINK tell their story —  and detail the hard fought journey of the dreams and trials behind their meteoric rise.
cast.title: BLACKPINK: Light Up the Sky

also_known_as: พัก ฮง-จุน
details.biography: Teddy Park (born Park Hong-jun on September 14, 1978), is a Korean–American rapper, songwriter, and record producer. Born in Seoul, South Korea, Park moved to the United States with his family as a young child. When he was 17 years old, Park and his friend Danny flew to South Korea during summer vacation to audition for YG Entertainment. Both were signed immediately, and after finishing high school in the States, moved to Korea to pursue music.
details.name: Teddy Park
